type: Legendary Creature – Human Pegasus Warlock Knight
rules_text:
Flying, first strike, vigilance
[i]Galeforce[/i] – Whenever Cordelia deals combat damage to a player, untap each creature you control with flying, their is an additional combat phase after this phase. This ability only triggers once each turn.
[i]Thoron[/i] – {2}{W}{B}, Discard a card: Cordelia, Dark Paragon deals 6 damage to target creature, planeswalker or battle.
[i]Promoted Class[/i] – {3}{W}{B}
